item.title: About
item.description:
I’m an applied Mathematics PhD student at North Carolina State University in Raleigh, NC under Alen Alexanderian. My interests include Inverse Problems, Optimization and High Performance Computing.

I competed my Bachelors in Mathematics and Computer Science at Stony Brook University. Afterwards I earned a master’s degree in Mathematics at the Technical University of Munich where my master’s thesis was advised by Stefan Weltge.

In my free time I tinker with software and electronics, play guitar, run, play Go and cook.
